availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Franklin Brown (Grant County, Kentucky, soldier (11th Cav))

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, soldier. Resident of Grant County, Kentucky, in 1862. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from September 22, 1862 to June 16, 1865. Captured at Blount County, Tennessee, on November 14, 1863. Prisoner of war from November 14, 1863 to April 3, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Card Records of Headstones Provided for Deceased Union Civil War Veterans, 1861-1904 RG 92, NARA Microfilm Series M1845.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations From the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0106.
